item.title: BALROG: Benchmarking Agentic LLM and VLM Reasoning On Games
item.description: BALROG benchmark rigorously evaluates LLMs’/VLMs’ abilities in complex games, revealing their strengths and weaknesses in long-term planning and decision-making, highlighting the need for improved vis…
